Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: (GETDATE())

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO [ims].[Category](CategoryName) VALUES(@CategoryName) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM [ims].[Category] WHERE [CategoryId] = @CategoryId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT [CategoryId] ,[CategoryName] FROM [ims].[Category] END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [ims].[GetAllCategories] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT CategoryId, CategoryName FROM [ims].[Category] WHERE [CategoryId] = @CategoryId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @TimeStamp DATETIME2 = ( SELECT GETDATE() );
INSERT INTO [ims].[LoggingError] ( [Timestamp] ,[LogLevel] ,[Message] ,[Exception] ,[InnerException] ,[StackTrace] ,[ApplicationName] ,[UserID] ,[MachineName] ,[Source] ,[RequestID] ,[AdditionalInfo] ) VALUES ( @TimeStamp ,@LogLevel ,@Message ,@Exception ,@InnerException ,@StackTrace ,@ApplicationName ,@UserID ,@MachineName ,@Source ,@RequestID ,@AdditionalInfo ) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [ims].[InsertLoggingError] ( @LogLevel VARCHAR(20) ,@Message NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@Exception NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@InnerException NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@StackTrace NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@ApplicationName VARCHAR(100) ,@UserID VARCHAR(50) ,@MachineName VARCHAR(50) ,@Source VARCHAR(100) ,@RequestID NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@AdditionalInfo NVARCHAR(MAX) ) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- Validate inputs IF @ErrorMessage IS NULL OR LEN(@ErrorMessage) = 0 BEGIN SET @ErrorMessage = 'An unspecified error occurred.'; END
-- Use THROW for modern error handling IF @ThrowException = 1 BEGIN -- If ErrorNumber is provided, format the message IF @ErrorNumber IS NOT NULL BEGIN; THROW @ErrorNumber, @ErrorMessage, @ErrorState; END ELSE BEGIN; THROW 50000, @ErrorMessage, @ErrorState; END END -- Use RAISERROR for legacy error handling ELSE BEGIN IF @ErrorNumber IS NOT NULL BEGIN RAISERROR (@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState) WITH NOWAIT; END ELSE BEGIN RAISERROR (@ErrorMessage, @ErrorSeverity, @ErrorState) WITH NOWAIT; END END END;

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @ErrorMessage NVARCHAR(MAX); DECLARE @ErrorNumber INT;
BEGIN TRY BEGIN --VALIDATIONS IF EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM [usr].[User] WHERE Username = @Username ) BEGIN SET @ErrorNumber = 50001
SELECT @ErrorMessage = MessageName FROM [ims].[DatabaseMessages] WHERE MessageId = @ErrorNumber
RAISERROR ( @ErrorMessage ,16 ,1 ); END END
INSERT INTO [usr].[USER] ( [Username] ,[PasswordHash] ,[StatusId] ,[MobileNumber] ,[Email] ,[RoleId] ) VALUES ( @Username ,@HashedPassword ,1 ,@MobileNumber ,@Email ,1 )
COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY
BEGIN CATCH SELECT 1;
ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
EXECUTE [ims].[RaisingError] @ErrorMessage = @ErrorMessage ,@ErrorNumber = @ErrorNumber END CATCH END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [usr].[AddingUser] ( @Username NVARCHAR(128) ,@HashedPassword NVARCHAR(MAX) ,@MobileNumber VARCHAR(32) ,@Email VARCHAR(128) ) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT @RoleName = RoleName FROM usr.Roles WHERE RoleId = @RoleId; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SELECT @userStatusDescription = [StatusDescripton] FROM usr.UserStatus WHERE [StatusId] = @UserStatusId END
